Super small but important update to make extra clear that Policy 3 (which covers Disruptive and Abusive Behavior) does, in fact, apply to all of our official venues:

Housed under General Behavior --> "This applies to all interactions within the in-game environment, the official GSIV Forums, GSWiki, and any areas of official communication."

~Kaikala

Just to piggyback off Kaikala here. This should have been known, but several incidents have recently come up where it was clear that it wasn't known. That's why we're spelling it out.

Other areas of official communication would be places like the official Facebook and Twitter accounts, which recently had some disruptive behavior happening (racial slurs being direct messaged, taking things happening in game to social media and vice verse). Again, we assume this is a bit of common sense, but it doesn't appear everyone thinks the same.
